name: Shrimp Toast II
author: ROSSCUP
summary: A shrimp mixture is spread on bread slices, coated with bread crumbs and fried to golden brown. These flavorful appetizers are a unique treat, and they may be made ahead of time and frozen.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined
¼ inch piece fresh ginger root, minced
½ cup fine dry bread crumbs
directions: In a blender or food processor, blend shrimp, onion, ginger, egg whites, salt and pepper until smooth
Cut each white bread slice into 4 triangles
Spread both sides of triangles with shrimp mixture and coat with bread crumbs
Cover and chill in the refrigerator approximately 1 hour
Heat oil in a large, heavy skillet to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
In small batches, fry bread triangles 3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown
Garnish with lemon juice before serving
